QuestData.Title: Serving A-Me 01
QuestData.Description: Greetings. I unit A-Me 01. You... $r?$B$BA-Me's mission to study the local gorillas was success. A-Me has gathered data that Karna needs.$b$bA-Me 01 not returning, though. A-Me has new family now. Here, with the gorillas, A-Me stay.$b$b<A-Me 01 detaches a small device from her hand and gives it to you.>$b$bYou bring data back to Karna. You tell her what happen.
QuestData.LogDescription: Bring A-Me's Thumb Drive back to Karna Remtravel at Mossy Pile in Un'Goro Crater.
QuestData.RewardText: She decided to stay? Fascinating... I'll have to look over this data and find out why.$B$BThank you again, $n. I really appreciate it.
